statements.select:
select instrumentsbarcode, barcode,customername,testname,createdate,standardprice,groupprice,contractprice,finalprice from (SELECT ROWNUM RN, t.* FROM ( select h1.instrumentsbarcode, h1.barcode,c1.customername,t1.testname,o1.createdate,sum(g1.standardprice) as standardprice,sum(g1.groupprice) as groupprice,sum(g1.contractprice) as contractprice,sum(g1.finalprice) as finalprice from hpvinstruments h1, ordertest o1, orders o2, dictcustomer c1, dicttestitem t1, ordergrouptest g1 where h1.barcode is not null and h1.dicttestitemid=t1.dicttestitemid and h1.dictcustomerid=c1.dictcustomerid and h1.barcode=o1.barcode and o1.ordernum=o2.ordernum
and o2.ordernum=g1.ordernum and o2.iscancel=0 and o2.status>20
h1.instcreatedate <to_date('$endDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')
h1.instcreatedate >= to_date('$startDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')
h1.dicttestitemid=$dictTestItemID$
h1.dictcustomerid=$customerid$
group by h1.instrumentsbarcode, h1.barcode,c1.customername,t1.testname,o1.createdate order by h1.instrumentsbarcode desc, h1.barcode,c1.customername,t1.testname,o1.createdate) t WHERE ROWNUM <=$pageEnd$ ) WHERE RN >= $pageStart$

select count(1) as total from hpvinstruments h1, ordertest o1, orders o2, dictcustomer c1, dicttestitem t1 where h1.barcode is not null and h1.dicttestitemid=t1.dicttestitemid and h1.dictcustomerid=c1.dictcustomerid and h1.barcode=o1.barcode and o1.ordernum=o2.ordernum and o2.iscancel=0 and o2.status>20
h1.instcreatedate <to_date('$endDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')
h1.instcreatedate >= to_date('$startDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')
h1.dicttestitemid=$dictTestItemID$
h1.dictcustomerid=$customerid$

select instrumentsbarcode, barcode,customername,testname,createdate,standardprice,groupprice,contractprice,finalprice from (SELECT ROWNUM RN, t.* FROM ( select h1.instrumentsbarcode, h1.barcode,c1.customername,t1.testname,o1.createdate,sum(g1.standardprice) as standardprice,sum(g1.groupprice) as groupprice,sum(g1.contractprice) as contractprice,sum(g1.finalprice) as finalprice from hpvinstruments h1, ordertest o1, orders o2, dictcustomer c1, dicttestitem t1, ordergrouptest g1 where h1.barcode is not null and h1.dicttestitemid=t1.dicttestitemid and h1.dictcustomerid=c1.dictcustomerid and h1.barcode=o1.barcode and o1.ordernum=o2.ordernum
and o2.ordernum=g1.ordernum and o2.iscancel=0 and o2.status between 5 and 20
h1.instcreatedate <to_date('$endDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')
h1.instcreatedate >= to_date('$startDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')
h1.dicttestitemid=$dictTestItemID$
h1.dictcustomerid=$customerid$
group by h1.instrumentsbarcode, h1.barcode,c1.customername,t1.testname,o1.createdate order by h1.instrumentsbarcode desc, h1.barcode,c1.customername,t1.testname,o1.createdate) t WHERE ROWNUM <=$pageEnd$ ) WHERE RN >= $pageStart$

select count(1) as total from hpvinstruments h1, ordertest o1, orders o2, dictcustomer c1, dicttestitem t1 where h1.barcode is not null and h1.dicttestitemid=t1.dicttestitemid and h1.dictcustomerid=c1.dictcustomerid and h1.barcode=o1.barcode and o1.ordernum=o2.ordernum and o2.iscancel=0 and o2.status between 5 and 20
h1.instcreatedate <to_date('$endDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')
h1.instcreatedate >= to_date('$startDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')
h1.dicttestitemid=$dictTestItemID$
h1.dictcustomerid=$customerid$

select instrumentsbarcode, barcode,customername,testname,createdate,''as standardprice,''as groupprice,''as contractprice,finalprice from (SELECT ROWNUM RN, t.* FROM ( select h1.instrumentsbarcode, h1.barcode,c1.customername,t1.testname,h1.instcreatedate as createdate,sum(b2.price) as finalprice from hpvinstruments h1, dictcustomer c1, dicttestitem t1, dictproductdetail a1, dicttestitem b2 where h1.barcode is null and h1.dicttestitemid=t1.dicttestitemid and h1.dictcustomerid=c1.dictcustomerid and h1.dicttestitemid=a1.productid and a1.testgroupid=b2.dicttestitemid
h1.instcreatedate <to_date('$endDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')
h1.instcreatedate >= to_date('$startDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')
h1.dicttestitemid=$dictTestItemID$
h1.dictcustomerid=$customerid$
group by h1.instrumentsbarcode, h1.barcode,c1.customername,t1.testname,h1.instcreatedate order by h1.instrumentsbarcode, h1.barcode,c1.customername,t1.testname,h1.instcreatedate) t WHERE ROWNUM <=$pageEnd$ ) WHERE RN >= $pageStart$

select count(1) as total from hpvinstruments h1, dictcustomer c1, dicttestitem t1 where h1.barcode is null and h1.dicttestitemid=t1.dicttestitemid and h1.dictcustomerid=c1.dictcustomerid
h1.instcreatedate <to_date('$endDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')
h1.instcreatedate >= to_date('$startDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')
h1.dicttestitemid=$dictTestItemID$
h1.dictcustomerid=$customerid$
